title: Journey Orchestration Step Data Fetch Fields
description: Journey Orchestration Data Fetch Field for a Step Event.

stepEvents.title: Journey Step Event Data Fetch Field.

fetchTotalTime.title: fetchTotalTime
fetchTotalTime.description: This Field describes the total amount of time spent in data fetch in milliseconds during the step processing.

fetchTypeInError.title: fetchTypeInError
fetchTypeInError.description: This Field defines if the fetch in error is on the platform or on a custom data source.

fetchError.title: fetchError
fetchError.description: This Field describes the type of error that happens when the data fetch is processed.

fetchErrorCode.title: fetchErrorCode
fetchErrorCode.description: This Field describes the Code for fetch error. Present if the error has a code, such as an HTTP one. For instance, if the actionExecError is http, the code 404 represents the HTTP 404 error.

fetchOriginError.title: fetchOriginError
fetchOriginError.description: This Field tells if there are any timeout or origin error, If the error comes on a retry:  the OriginError/OriginErrorCode describes the error encountered on the attempt before the retry.

fetchOriginErrorCode.title: fetchOriginErrorCode
fetchOriginErrorCode.description: This Field describes the error code encountered on the attempt before the retry, Error type is being defined by fetchOriginError.

fetchCount.title: fetchCount
fetchCount.description: This Field gives the count , How many times the data is fetched, regardless of the type of source (AEP, custom).

fetchPlatformTotalTime.title: fetchPlatformTotalTime
fetchPlatformTotalTime.description: The total amount of time taken to fetch the data from Adobe Experience Platform (AEP) in milliseconds.

fetchPlatformCount.title: fetchPlatformCount
fetchPlatformCount.description: How many times the data is fetched from Adobe Experience Platform(AEP).

fetchCustomTotalTime.title: fetchCustomTotalTime
fetchCustomTotalTime.description: Time to fetch the custom data in milliseconds. Remark: this time is computed from the time the engine sends the enrichment event to the enrichment service and receive the response.

fetchCustomCount.title: fetchCustomCount
fetchCustomCount.description: How many times the custom data is fetched from external systems.
